article_title: Pain or pleasure? Tax filing season begins Tuesday; deadline April 18
article_text: 3 rescued from deserted island after writing 'help' on beach

article_metadata.description: On Tuesday, the Internal Revenue Service will begin processing tax returns, with about 1.2 million of them coming from Nevada taxpayers.
